section.title: Python Packages
section.para: SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring uses pip for installing Python packages. When installing SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring software components, pip V8.1.1 is automatically installed.

note.para: Check whether pip is already installed on the machine on which the SUSE OpenStack Cloud Monitoring components are to be installed. The installation fails if V8.1.2 or a version older than V7.0.3 is already installed.
